https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sm7W4BzAiCKDrhnRuFd8iHNcrQi.jpg In a remote class, a shy and emotionally reserved classmate decides to come out as lesbian. Longing for love and support, she is left to face a disappointed friend and a homophobic bully. Blue Girl
